The framework for the conduct of assessments is designed to support the achievement of dependable assessment results. The framework includes an architecture for rating processes and for presenting assessment ratings. The assessment framework also provides guidance on the conduct of the assessment. ISO/IEC TR 15504 provides guidance in the contexts of both process improvement and process capability determination.
